title: Looking for New Flex Club member (한국인오던가)

embed.description: Flysya / Platinum 2 71LP / 61W 40L Win Ratio 60% / Xerath - 40W 11L Win Ratio 78%, Kog'Maw - 20W 8L Win Ratio 71%, Cassiopeia - 10W 7L Win Ratio 59%, Twitch - 9W 5L Win Ratio 64%, Teemo - 7W 5L Win Ratio 58%

body:
Condition to Entry
1. Flex 5v5 Rank (Plat-Dia)
2. Win Rate (60%-100%)
3. At least 2-4 times for a week Needs to play more than 3hours with team mates
4. Someone who try hard to WIN
5. At least One main position(if you can play any position choose 2 positions which is more better)
6. Know how to use Discord

 Favorable condition 
1.  Korean background or Korean continues speaker 
2. Skilled at meta and non meta off picks
3. Strong mental 

This club is based on Flex 5v5 Rank.
Most of players are Korean but we loved to have other nationality.
When you join our club we will practice 5v5 on custom and play Flex 5v5 Rank
If you are interested add "Flysya" on League OR add "kojo1301"  on KaKao Talk
